DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess psychological , cognitive social resource applicants Huntington 's Disease Presymptomatic Testing .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Psychological , Cognitive Social Resources Applicants Huntington 's Disease Presymptomatic Genetic Testing
DOC.criteria: Applicants Huntington 's Disease Presymptomatic Testing Aged 18 year Huntington disease family member Subject give write consent No national health insurance affiliation Being guardianship Meeting brain MRI exclusion criterion ( pacemaker , aneurysm clip , artificial heart valve , ear implant , metal fragment foreign object eye , skin , body , Renal failure , hypersensitivity Gadolinium ) refuse MRI . Patient movement disorder
